content.question: A computer program can find a specific name in an alphabetical list of names. The function <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> models the number of steps the program goes through to find the name in a list with a total of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> names. The values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> change proportionately as values of <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> increase in equal-length intervals. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="h open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 e to the power of 2 x end exponent"><mn>3</mn><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></math>
<math alttext="3 sin open parentheses 2 x close parentheses"><mn>3</mn><mi>sin</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

topic.text: 2.14: Logarithmic Function Context and Data Modeling

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
